expo.name: ARN Complete App
expo.description: An app showcasing the lessons and learning from Academind's React Native - The Practical Guide [2020 Edition] course with Maximilian Schwarzmuller via Udemy.com.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take a picture of your surroundings for the 'Device Feature's - Place' thumbnail.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to create a pin at your address for the 'Device Feature's - Place'.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to save your picture of your location in 'Device Feature's - Place'.
